con:soapui-project.name: PuposeOfUse&RoleTypeAttribute

con:testSuite.name: NISTPurposeForOfUse&Role
con:testSuite.con:description: This suite checks namespace "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" for type in Role and PurposeForOfUse

con:testCase.name: Document Query
con:testCase.con:description: Set PuposeForUseEnabled=true in gateway.properties and 2.2 in purposeUse.properties. The outcome should be "PurposeOfUse" since G1 endpoint is used.

con:testStep.name: Clear AA Mapping Table & Add Mapping

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep
con:testStep.con:description:
Verify PurposeOfUse and Role type attribute field within saml attribute statement Nhin Interface
1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/DocumentQuery/3_0/NhinService/RespondingGateway_Query_Service/DocQuery (replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for PurposeOfUse within request and should populate as shown "hl7:PurposeOfUse xmlns:hl7="urn:hl7-org:v3" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" code="PUBLICHEALTH" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.18.7.1" codeSystemName="nhin-purpose" displayName="Use or disclosure of Psychotherapy Notes" xsi:type="CE"" c) Look for Role within request and should populate as shown "hl7:Role xmlns:hl7="urn:hl7-org:v3" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" code="307969004" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMED_CT" displayName="Public Health" xsi:type="CE""

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following for PurposeOfUse in Nhin Request "hl7:PurposeOfUse xmlns:hl7="urn:hl7-org:v3" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" code="PUBLICHEALTH" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.18.7.1" codeSystemName="nhin-purpose" displayName="Use or disclosure of Psychotherapy Notes" xsi:type="CE"" Result should display the following for PurposeOfUse in Nhin Request "hl7:Role xmlns:hl7="urn:hl7-org:v3" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" code="307969004" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMED_CT" displayName="Public Health" xsi:type="CE""

con:testCase.name: Patient Discovery
con:testCase.con:description: Set PuposeForUseEnabled=true in gateway.properties and 2.2 in purposeUse.properties. The outcome should be "PurposeForUse" since G0 endpoint is used.

con:testStep.name: Manual TestStep
con:testStep.con:description: Verify PurposeForUse and Role type attribute field within saml attribute statement Nhin Interface . 1. Check the content Type in Nhin Outbound and Inbound Message A) Search the log file and look for https://localhost:8181/Gateway/PatientDiscovery/1_0/NhinService/NhinPatientDiscovery (replace the localhost with server ip address if its different) Outbound Message, Inbound Message B) Look for PurposeForUse within request and should populate as shown "PurposeForUse xmlns:hl7="urn:hl7-org:v3" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" code="PUBLICHEALTH" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.18.7.1" codeSystemName="nhin-purpose" displayName="Use or disclosure of Psychotherapy Notes" xsi:type="CE"" c) Look for Role within request and should populate as shown "Role xmlns:hl7="urn:hl7-org:v3" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" code="307969004" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMED_CT" displayName="Public Health" xsi:type="CE""

con:config.con:expectedResult: Result should display the following in Nhin Request "PurposeForUse xmlns:hl7="urn:hl7-org:v3" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" code="PUBLICHEALTH" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.18.7.1" codeSystemName="nhin-purpose" displayName="Use or disclosure of Psychotherapy Notes" xsi:type="CE"" Result should display the following in Nhin Request "Role xmlns:hl7="urn:hl7-org:v3" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" code="307969004" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMED_CT" displayName="Public Health" xsi:type="CE""
